org.openimaj.image.processing.edges

Class CannyEdgeDetector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.edges.CannyEdgeDetector2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class CannyEdgeDetector2
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    This implementation is deprecated and is only kept for backward-compatibility of old EdgeDirectionCoherenceVector features. Use the CannyEdgeDetector instead.

    This is an implementation of the canny edge detector that was found somewhere out there on the web with no attribution. If this is your code and you don't want it in OpenIMAJ, please let us know.

    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
